replies.body: Is there a SO HOT boards member for every female champion?

The real question, has the Taric one been taken yet?

Edit:  Yes, as of 2 minutes ago.

I will probably just level it enough to use on the boards as well as use it to get 5 man clubs for my friends so they can have custom tags.  I have a good 15+ accounts for those two purposes.

It might become a smurf account though, the one I was using to help teach my friends and other new people the game is getting pretty high level so I need a new one anyways.  Sucks bringing high level people into low level games which is why I play on low leveled accounts while doing it and make sure to play champions I am not familiar with 90% of the time so it isn't as unfair for the enemy team.

(I say this to make it clear that while it may be a smurf account in the sense that a smurf account is any account that isn't your main account I do not use smurf accounts for the purposes that many others do.  I use smurf accounts for reasons purely positive to the community)
This is equal parts adorable and terrifying.
They're not hopping all over the place incessantly. This meme is clearly inaccurate.
